channel.title: Services on InMOS
channel.description: Recent content in Services on InMOS

item.description: Quantifying the total oceanic CO2 sink and determining anthropogenic and climate-driven controls. Assessing trends, drivers, and distribution of ocean deoxygenation.
Developing emergent theory and parametrizations linking deoxygenation, CO2 uptake, and heat uptake through ocean circulation and biological processes.
Producing novel observational products and modeling tools for integrated constraints on ocean carbon and oxygen cycling.
